name: Airport Fire Truck Simulation
description: Ever wanted to be a fire fighter? well now is your chance! You will be an airport fire fighter and your job is to take care of fires that happen on planes. This game is so realistic, you'll feel like a real fire fighter.
developers: HRY GROUP BILISIM INSAAT SANAYI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
publishers: HRY GROUP BILISIM INSAAT SANAYI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
